class.name: OScriptNodeDecompose
class.brief_description: Breaks a [Variant] type down into its subcomponents.
class.description: This node allows breaking a given [Variant] type into its subcomponent types. For example, taking a [Vector3] and splitting it into its scalar subcomponents of [code]x[/code], [code]y[/code], and [code]z[/code]. This node can be found in the [param All Actions] window using the keywords [code]break[/code], [code]decompose[/code], or [code]split[/code].
